sentences.sContent: The script has been gathering editorial accretions for years.
sentences.sCn: 该剧本经历了多年的修改加工。

synos.tran: 添加；增加物；连生；冲积层

remMethod.val: ac + cret(增加) + ion → 增长

words.tran: 使依附；使连接；把…吸引过来

trans.tranOther: a gradual process by which new things are added and something gradually changes or gets bigger
